required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effect of Age on the Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of IV Rivipansel.
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Non-randomized, Open-label, Parallel-group Single-dose Study To Estimate The Effect Of Age On The Pharmacokinetics, Safety And Tolerability Of Intravenous Rivipansel (Pf-06460031)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of age on PK, safety and tolerability of IV rivipansel.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time 0 extrapolated to infinite time or area under the plasma concentration-time from time 0 to time of the last quantifiable concentration as data permit.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours following single dose administration of IV rivipansel
Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours following single dose administration of rivipansel.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time profile from time 0 to time of last quantifiable concentration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours following single dose administration of rivipansel.
Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours following single dose administration of rivipansel.
Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours following single dose administration of rivipansel.

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of distribution at steady state
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Samples are collected pre-dose and at 0.33, 1, 3, 6, 8, 12, 16, 24, 36, 48 and 72 hours following single dose administration of rivipansel.

arm_group.description: A single dose of IV rivipansel over 20 minutes.
A single dose of IV rivipansel over 20 minutes.

intervention.description: A single dose of IV rivipansel over 20 minutes.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy female subjects of non-childbearing potential or healthy male subjects who are between the ages of 18-45 years or 65 years of age or older.
- Body mass index (BMI) of 17.5 to 40 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Evidence or history of clinically significant hematological, renal, endocrine, pulmonary, gastrointestinal, cardiovascular, hepatic, psychiatric, neurologic, or allergic disease (including drug allergies, but excluding untreated, asymptomatic, seasonal allergies at the time of dosing).
- Pregnant females; breastfeeding female subjects; male subjects with partners currently pregnant
- Treatment with another investigational drug within 30 days or 5 half-lives preceding the dose of study medication
- Blood donation within 60 days prior to dosing.
